reviews.title: Our Family Caring for Your Family

review1.text: David and Claire were absolutely wonderful during the most difficult time of our lives. Their compassion and attention to detail made everything so much easier. They treated our mum with such dignity and respect.
review1.author: Sarah Mitchell

review2.text: Cannot recommend Barringtons highly enough. As a family-run business, they understand the importance of personal touches. They went above and beyond to accommodate our special requests.
review2.author: James Thompson

review3.text: The team at Barringtons are professional, kind, caring, and truly supportive. They helped make a very difficult time feel calm and manageable, guiding me with compassion every step of the way. I cannot thank them enough for taking such good care of my Mum and I am eternally grateful.
review3.author: Hayley Wynd

review4.text: All the staff were amazing towards us especially Julie and Josh who couldn't do enough for us after the loss of my dad, they kept checking in with us and gave us so much help to give my dad the best send off he deserved, can't thank you enough xx
review4.author: Diane Seddon

review5.text: I offer warmest thanks to David, Angie and the Waterloo Barringtons team for arranging my Graham's funeral that took place on 7 March 2025. I had contacted them on my Vicar's advice.
review5.author: Pauline Goodchild

family.title: Liverpool's Independent & Family Run Funeral Service
family.description1: Barringtons is a family owned funeral directors, run by David and Claire Barrington together with our dedicated team, we understand the importance of providing you and your family with a service that is personal, warm, and completely individual.
family.description2: We believe that every farewell should reflect the unique life it celebrates, and we're honoured to help you to create these meaningful services.
